name: Disturbing Forest
description:
Disturbing Forest is a first-person adventure game in fantasy climates. Graphics in the game are colorful and atmospheric. Our production puts a lot of emphasis on the story told. The plot of the game is non-linear. In Disturbing Forest the player can use the so-called Detective Mode to get to know the game world better. The soundtrack of the game is refined and introduces the right atmosphere.

Features

  • Colorful, atmospheric low-poly graphics,
  • An extensive alchemy system,
  • Non-linear plot,
  • An interesting world for exploration,
  • A lot of easter eggs,
  • Detective mode to help you discover your story,
  • Characteristic characters,
  • Climatic soundtrack.
